meanings.definition: The act or power of sensing with the eyes; sight.
meanings.sent1: Her visioned improved after getting glasses.
meanings.sent2: His visioned was clear and sharp in the bright sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The cat's visioned of catching the laser pointer was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The artist's visioned of the perfect landscape was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The visioned of the rainbow after the rain was vivid in her mind.

meanings.definition: The act or power of anticipating that which will or may come to be.
meanings.sent1: His visioned of winning the race kept him motivated.
meanings.sent2: The team had a shared visioned of success for the project.
meanings.sent3: Her visioned of finding a unicorn in the backyard was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The entrepreneur's visioned of a thriving business was inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The visioned of a bright future gave them hope during tough times.

meanings.definition: A mental image produced by the imagination.
meanings.sent1: The writer's visioned of a magical world was captivating.
meanings.sent2: Children often have vivid visioned of imaginary creatures.
meanings.sent3: His visioned of a talking sandwich was amusingly bizarre.
meanings.sent4: The artist's visioned of a flying elephant was striking.
meanings.sent5: The visioned of a giant ice cream cone was unforgettable.
